question_paper.question_paper_name: 2022 Oct: IIT M QUIZ 1 DEGREE QPG3
question_paper.question_paper_description: 2022 Oct: IIT M QUIZ 1 DEGREE QPG3

questions.question_text_1: Which of the following represents the order in which artifacts are written in test driven development?
question_texts: Which of the following represents the order in which artifacts are written in test driven development?

questions.question_text_1: A test case is said to have passed when which of the following holds?
question_texts: A test case is said to have passed when which of the following holds?

options.option_text: The actual output is different from expected output but there is no error
The actual output is the same as the expected output.
The software produces an output successfully upon giving an input.
There is a message that there is no error from the program

questions.question_text_1: Which of the following represents the correct order of subsumption amongst data-flow coverage criteria in graphs? Read the symbol → below as “subsumes”.
question_texts: Which of the following represents the correct order of subsumption amongst data-flow coverage criteria in graphs? Read the symbol → below as “subsumes”.

options.option_text: It accepts all the binary strings that have an odd number of 0s.
It accepts all the binary strings that have an odd number of 1s.
It accepts all the binary strings that have an odd number of 0s and an oddnumber of 1s.
It accepts all the binary strings that have an even number of 0s and an evennumber of 1s.

questions.question_text_1: For a tester to observe an error or a fault in a particular location of a program, which of the following should be true together?
question_texts: For a tester to observe an error or a fault in a particular location of a program, which of the following should be true together?

options.option_text: The location of the program should be reachable by the test case given by thetester.
The state of the program must be incorrect at that location of the program.
The final state of the program should be incorrect.
The tester should see the error in the program.
